about_the_game:
Another adventure awaits!

It’s time for the next stage of evolution—colonizing space.

Naturally, the moon is the ideal starting point for a colony, but other worlds won’t wait for long. It’s time to settle Mars or any planet of your choice.

If that’s not enough, remember, the universe is infinite, and humanity’s story must continue.

 

This set provides everything you need for various types of colonies, including solar power plants, depots, mines, and laboratories.

Plus, it comes with different versions for day, night, dark night, and hot climates to enhance visual adaptation.

 

Contents

PARALLAXES: x48 (Mars, Moon, Saturn, Uranus, and more planets)

CHARACTERS: x8 with color variations

FACESETS: x8 with color variations

TILESETS: x52

*In the tileset folder, you’ll find A1, A2, A4, A5, B, C, D (52X)

・This pack is for use in Maker Series ONLY.

・OK to be used in Commercial projects made in RPG Maker.

・You may modify some of the assets (but not redistribute them) for your own game use only.

Another adventure awaits!

It’s time for the next stage of evolution—colonizing space.

Naturally, the moon is the ideal starting point for a colony, but other worlds won’t wait for long. It’s time to settle Mars or any planet of your choice.

If that’s not enough, remember, the universe is infinite, and humanity’s story must continue.

 

This set provides everything you need for various types of colonies, including solar power plants, depots, mines, and laboratories.

Plus, it comes with different versions for day, night, dark night, and hot climates to enhance visual adaptation.

 

Contents

PARALLAXES: x48 (Mars, Moon, Saturn, Uranus, and more planets)

CHARACTERS: x8 with color variations

FACESETS: x8 with color variations

TILESETS: x52

*In the tileset folder, you’ll find A1, A2, A4, A5, B, C, D (52X)

・This pack is for use in Maker Series ONLY.
